description.title: And then there was IPad
text: The Apple M2 is Apple's next-generation silicon with an 8-core CPU that delivers up to 15% performance improvement
The Liquid Retina XDR display provides realistic detail with a contrast ratio of 1,000,000:1

description.title: Camera
text: iPad Pro features an ultra-wide-angle camera with a 12-megapixel sensor and a 122-degree field of view, perfect for taking photos and videos for social media posts.

description.title: LiDAR
text: A LiDAR scanner measures how long it takes light to reflect off objects, so it can create a depth map of any space you're in.
